name: Phantasm (itch)
description:
Experience a 2D action platformer game sets in many different enviroments and game mechanics. Die over and over again to learn from your mistakes to overcome challenges.

Phantasm tells a story about YOU as the player who's being thrown to a virtual world by a mad scientist called "The Phantasm Project" and lost all of your memories in side the virtual world. To get out of The Phantasm, You must explore the entire world to find a glitch that takes him to the real world.

As You goes deeper into the world, he will find notes contains information about the world and why You're thrown in this world.

These are our characters for the game world.

    

These are not character selection. The character you control will change after you change a level.

It's not just about the skin, it changes how you play the game.

The movement speed, weapons, and attack speed are different  for every character.
